## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:**	[Vitvi01g01629](https://ensembl.gramene.org/id/Vitvi01g01629)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>VvWRKY8</u>
- **Gene Name:** WRKY transcription factor 8
- **Genome:** [Vitis vinifera PN40024.v4](https://ensembl.gramene.org/Vitis_vinifera/Info/Index)
- **Species:** *Vitis vinifera*

## Functional Descriptions:
   - MYB30 and MYB14 form a repressor–activator module with **WRKY8** that controls stilbene biosynthesis in grapevine.
   - **VvWRKY8** represses stilbene synthase genes through direct interaction with VvMYB14 to control resveratrol biosynthesis in grapevine
   - The VvMYB14–**VvWRKY8**–VvMYB30 regulatory circuit balances stilbene biosynthesis.
   - Transient and stable overexpression of **VvWRKY8** in grapevine results in decreased expression of VvSTS15/21 and VvMYB14, as well as in a reduction of Res accumulation.
   - The VvMYB14-VvSTS15/21-Res-**VvWRKY8** regulatory loop may be an important mechanism for the fine-tuning of Res biosynthesis in grapevine.

## Function-related keywords:
   - [abiotic-stresse](/tags/abiotic-stresse/),&nbsp;&nbsp;[biotic-stresse](/tags/biotic-stresse/)
